did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Ken Hodges' "The Womack School: An Education of Sorts," 2003.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Essay about Hodges' acquaintance with H. Lynn Womack, headmaster of a school Hodges attended in 1945-46.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Essay about Hodges' acquaintance with H. Lynn Womack, headmaster of a school Hodges attended in 1945-46.
